summary: REQ-17 (remove Login/Logout from header) and REQ-18 (update confirmation message) appear implemented in the shown code diffs. REQ-16 (replace the actual QR image file at the static asset path) is not evidenced in the diff summary, so it appears missing. The diff summary also indicates several additional, unrequested frontend changes (connectivity banner, error handling, theme/config/docs) via the modified frontend-file-summaries.txt and urlParams utilities.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the payment QR image by updating the static asset file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` while keeping the existing path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show any change to `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` (no asset file change is listed). Only code/text files are shown as modified.
evidence: file-diff: Modified files list does not include `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png`

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed admin-related URL parameter/session persistence utilities (e.g., secret token extraction and clearing from hash) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to replace QR asset, remove Login/Logout UI, and update confirmation text; URL param persistence/cleanup is outside scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend connectivity checking hook and a non-blocking warning banner UI when backend is unreachable.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-16/17/18 and not part of the stated goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced LeadCaptureForm error handling with expandable technical details and extensive debugging/logging.
Payment configuration changes (UPI link updates and documentation/comments) beyond swapping the static QR asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 explicitly says no code changes are required to reference a different QR path; updating payment configuration/link is outside the requested changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual theme changes (index.css palette changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only specific UI element removal and message text change were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Large documentation update in `frontend/README.md` unrelated to the three requested UI changes.
New/changed actor/config/error utilities (actor creation config module, actor error normalization) beyond requested UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly lists backend/payment logic as non-goals and only asks for limited frontend UI/asset updates.
